The video shows a person in police unifo: leading to the claim that he is an RSS member.
The claim is widely shared on social med: 3. There are additional images circulating on social media that try to establish a connection between the person in the video and Lok Sabha speaker Om Birla, suggesting that he is an RSS member.
Alt News: a fact-checking organization, found that the claim linking the person in the video to Om Birla is false and identified the person in the images as BJP MLA Ashok Dogra from Bundi assembly constituency in Rajasthan.
